description: Returns details about a specific version of a specific application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the application.

parameters.name: applicationVersion
parameters.description: The specific version of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationVersion
nested_items.description: The specific version of the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the application version was created.

nested_items.name: definitionContent
nested_items.description: The content of the application definition. This is a JSON object that contains the resource configuration and definitions that identify an application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the application version.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the application version.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.
